comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Francis Gordon Caffey (b. 1868 in Montgomery, AL), was a lawyer, US Attorney for the Southern District of New York, 1917-1921; US District Judge for the Southern District of New York, 1929. The middle initial is different from the Bain caption, but it's definitely the same guy: www.encyclopediaofalabama.org/face/Multimedia.jsp?id=m-2205

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you, pennylrichardsca. Will submit for review and update to the catalog record.
